data.name: HANA_AsignacionesOTInterna
data.value: SELECT DISTINCT cc."Code" AS "ID", q1."U_SCGD_Sucur" || '-' || CAST(q1."LineNum" AS varchar) || '-' || cc."Code" AS "IDRepXOrd", itm."U_SCGD_T_Fase" AS "NoFase", q1."ItemCode", q1."U_SCGD_DurSt" AS "DuracionAprobada", cc."Code" AS "NoOrden", q1."Dscription" AS "ItemName", cc."U_Estad" AS "Estado", fp."Name" AS "Descripcion", emp."empID" AS "IDEmp", (emp."firstName" || ' ' || emp."lastName") AS "NombreEmp", q1."DocEntry" AS "NumCot", q1."LineNum", 0 AS "U_SCGD_DurSt", 0 AS "U_SCGD_TiempoReal", 0 AS "Price" FROM "@SCGD_CTRLCOL" cc INNER JOIN QUT1 q1 ON cc."Code" = q1."U_SCGD_NoOT" AND cc."U_IdAct" = q1.U_SCGD_ID INNER JOIN OITM itm ON q1."ItemCode" = itm."ItemCode" LEFT OUTER JOIN "@SCGD_FASEPRODUCCION" fp ON itm."U_SCGD_T_Fase" = fp."Code" INNER JOIN OHEM emp ON cc."U_Colab" = emp."empID" WHERE cc."Code" = '{0}'

data.name: HANA_EdicionRegistroTiempo
data.value: SELECT T3."LineId", T4."empID", CONCAT(T4."firstName", CONCAT(' ', T4."lastName")) AS "Name", T2."Dscription" AS "Service", T3."U_CosRe" AS "RealCost", T3."U_CosEst" AS "StandardCost", T3."U_DFIni" AS "StartDate", T3."U_HFIni" AS "StartTime", T3."U_DFFin" AS "EndDate", T3."U_HFFin" AS "EndTime", T2."U_SCGD_DurSt" AS "StandardDuration", T4."U_SCGD_sALXHORA" AS "HourlyWage", IFNULL(T5."U_ExtraHourRate", 0) AS "ExtraHourRate", T3."U_TMin" AS "TotalMinutes", IFNULL(T4."U_SCGD_WorksWeekends", 'N') AS "WorksWeekends" FROM "@SCGD_OT" T0 INNER JOIN "OQUT" T1 ON T0."U_DocEntry" = T1."DocEntry" INNER JOIN "QUT1" T2 ON T1."DocEntry" = T2."DocEntry" INNER JOIN "@SCGD_CTRLCOL" T3 ON T0."Code" = T3."Code" AND T2."U_SCGD_ID" = T3."U_IdAct" INNER JOIN "OHEM" T4 ON T3."U_Colab" = T4."empID" INNER JOIN "@SCGD_CONF_SUCURSAL" T5 ON T0."U_Sucu" = T5."U_Sucurs" WHERE T0."Code" = '{0}' AND T3."U_Estad" IN ('{1}', '{2}') Order By T4."empID", T3."LineId"

data.name: HANA_ExisteOrdenCompraNC
data.value: SELECT COUNT(*) AS "Cuenta" FROM "RPC1" T0 INNER JOIN "PCH1" T1 ON T0."BaseEntry" = T1."DocEntry" AND T0."BaseLine" = T1."LineNum" AND T0."BaseType" = T1."ObjType" LEFT JOIN "PDN1" T2 ON T1."BaseEntry" = T2."DocEntry" AND T1."BaseLine" = T2."LineNum" AND T1."BaseType" = T2."ObjType" WHERE T0."DocEntry" = '{0}' AND (T1."BaseType" = '22' OR T2."BaseType" = '22')

data.name: HANA_QueryCosteos
data.value: SELECT CASE WHEN (SELECT Count(1) AS "QTY" FROM "@SCGD_VEHICULO" WHERE ( "U_Cod_Unid" = '{0}' ) AND ( U_SALINID <> 0 ) AND ( U_SALINID IS NOT NULL )) > 0 THEN 1 ELSE CASE WHEN (SELECT Count(1) FROM "@SCGD_VEHICULO" "@SCGD_VEHICULO_1" WHERE ( "U_Cod_Unid" = '{0}' ) AND ( U_SALINIC <> 0 ) AND ( U_SALINIC IS NOT NULL )) > 0 THEN 1 ELSE CASE WHEN (SELECT Count(1) FROM JDT1 JDT1_1 INNER JOIN OJDT OJDT_1 ON JDT1_1."TransId" = OJDT_1."TransId" LEFT OUTER JOIN ORTT ORTT_1 ON OJDT_1."RefDate" = ORTT_1."RateDate" AND ( ORTT_1."Currency" = JDT1_1."FCCurrency" OR ( JDT1_1."FCCurrency" IS NULL OR JDT1_1."FCCurrency" = '{3}' ) AND ORTT_1."Currency" = '{1}' ) WHERE ( JDT1_1."U_SCGD_Cod_Unidad" = '{0}' ) AND ( JDT1_1."SYSDeb" <> 0 ) AND ( OJDT_1."TransId" NOT IN (SELECT L."U_NoAsient" FROM "@SCGD_GRLINES" L INNER JOIN "@SCGD_GOODRECEIVE" GR ON GR."DocEntry" = L."DocEntry" AND GR."U_Unidad" = '{0}' AND L."U_NoAsient" IS NOT NULL) ) AND ( OJDT_1."RefDate" <= '{4}' ) AND ( JDT1_1."U_SCGD_Cod_Tran" IN (SELECT "Code" FROM "@SCGD_TRAN_COMP" "@SCGD_TRAN_COMP_7") ) OR ( JDT1_1."U_SCGD_Cod_Unidad" = '{0}' ) AND ( OJDT_1."TransId" NOT IN (SELECT L."U_NoAsient" FROM "@SCGD_GRLINES" L INNER JOIN "@SCGD_GOODRECEIVE" GR ON GR."DocEntry" = L."DocEntry" AND GR."U_Unidad" = '{0}' AND L."U_NoAsient" IS NOT NULL) ) AND ( OJDT_1."RefDate" <= '{4}' ) AND ( JDT1_1."U_SCGD_Cod_Unidad" IN (SELECT "Code" FROM "@SCGD_TRAN_COMP" "@SCGD_TRAN_COMP_5") ) AND ( JDT1_1."FCDebit" <> 0 ) OR ( JDT1_1."U_SCGD_Cod_Unidad" = '{0}' ) AND ( OJDT_1."TransId" NOT IN (SELECT L."U_NoAsient" FROM "@SCGD_GRLINES" L INNER JOIN "@SCGD_GOODRECEIVE" GR ON GR."DocEntry" = L."DocEntry" AND GR."U_Unidad" = '{0}' AND L."U_NoAsient" IS NOT NULL) ) AND ( OJDT_1."RefDate" <= '{4}' ) AND ( JDT1_1."U_SCGD_Cod_Tran" IN (SELECT "Code" FROM "@SCGD_TRAN_COMP" "@SCGD_TRAN_COMP_4") ) AND ( JDT1_1."Debit" <> 0 )) > 0 THEN 1 ELSE CASE WHEN (SELECT Count(1) FROM JDT1 JDT1 INNER JOIN OJDT OJDT ON JDT1."TransId" = OJDT."TransId" LEFT OUTER JOIN ORTT ORTT ON OJDT."RefDate" = ORTT."RateDate" AND ( ORTT."Currency" = JDT1."FCCurrency" OR ( JDT1."FCCurrency" IS NULL OR JDT1."FCCurrency" = '{2}' ) AND ORTT."Currency" = '{1}' ) WHERE ( JDT1."U_SCGD_Cod_Unidad" = '{0}' ) AND ( JDT1."SYSCred" <> 0 ) AND ( OJDT."TransId" NOT IN (SELECT L."U_NoAsient" FROM "@SCGD_GRLINES" L INNER JOIN "@SCGD_GOODRECEIVE" GR ON GR."DocEntry" = L."DocEntry" AND GR."U_Unidad" = '{0}' AND L."U_NoAsient" IS NOT NULL) ) AND ( OJDT."RefDate" <= '{4}' ) AND ( JDT1."U_SCGD_Cod_Tran" IN (SELECT "Code" FROM "@SCGD_TRAN_COMP" "@SCGD_TRAN_COMP_3") ) OR ( JDT1."U_SCGD_Cod_Unidad" = '{0}' ) AND ( OJDT."TransId" NOT IN (SELECT L."U_NoAsient" FROM "@SCGD_GRLINES" L INNER JOIN "@SCGD_GOODRECEIVE" GR ON GR."DocEntry" = L."DocEntry" AND GR."U_Unidad" = '{0}' AND L."U_NoAsient" IS NOT NULL) ) AND ( OJDT."RefDate" <= '{4}' ) AND ( JDT1."U_SCGD_Cod_Tran" IN (SELECT "Code" FROM "@SCGD_TRAN_COMP" "@SCGD_TRAN_COMP_2") ) AND ( JDT1."fcCredit" <> 0 ) OR ( JDT1."U_SCGD_Cod_Unidad" = '{0}' ) AND ( OJDT."TransId" NOT IN (SELECT L."U_NoAsient" FROM "@SCGD_GRLINES" L INNER JOIN "@SCGD_GOODRECEIVE" GR ON GR."DocEntry" = L."DocEntry" AND GR."U_Unidad" = '{0}' AND L."U_NoAsient" IS NOT NULL) ) AND ( OJDT."RefDate" <= '{4}' ) AND ( JDT1."U_SCGD_Cod_Tran" IN (SELECT "Code" FROM "@SCGD_TRAN_COMP" "@SCGD_TRAN_COMP_1") ) AND ( JDT1."Credit" <> 0 )) > 0 THEN 1 ELSE CASE WHEN (SELECT Count(1) FROM PCH1 INNER JOIN OPCH ON PCH1."DocEntry" = OPCH."DocEntry" INNER JOIN OJDT ON OPCH."TransId" = OJDT."TransId" WHERE ( PCH1."U_SCGD_Cod_Unid" = '{0}' ) AND ( OPCH."DocType" = '{5}' OR OPCH."DocType" = '{6}' ) AND ( OJDT."TransId" NOT IN (SELECT L."U_NoAsient" FROM "@SCGD_GRLINES" L INNER JOIN "@SCGD_GOODRECEIVE" GR ON GR."DocEntry" = L."DocEntry" AND GR."U_Unidad" = '{0}' AND L."U_NoAsient" IS NOT NULL) ) AND ( OPCH."DocDate" <= '{4}' ) AND ( PCH1."U_SCGD_Cod_Tran" IN (SELECT "Code" FROM "@SCGD_TRAN_COMP" "@SCGD_TRAN_COMP_1") )) > 0 THEN 1 ELSE CASE WHEN (SELECT Count(1) FROM RPC1 INNER JOIN ORPC ON RPC1."DocEntry" = ORPC."DocEntry" AND RPC1."TrgetEntry" IS NULL INNER JOIN OJDT ON ORPC."TransId" = OJDT."TransId" WHERE ( RPC1."U_SCGD_Cod_Unid" = '{0}' ) AND ( ORPC."DocType" = '{5}' OR ORPC."DocType" = '{6}' ) AND ( OJDT."TransId" NOT IN (SELECT L."U_NoAsient" FROM "@SCGD_GRLINES" L INNER JOIN "@SCGD_GOODRECEIVE" GR ON GR."DocEntry" = L."DocEntry" AND GR."U_Unidad" = '{0}' AND L."U_NoAsient" IS NOT NULL) ) AND ( ORPC."DocDate" <= '{4}' ) AND ( RPC1."U_SCGD_Cod_Tran" IN ( SELECT "Code" FROM "@SCGD_TRAN_COMP" "@SCGD_TRAN_COMP_1") )) > 0 THEN 1 ELSE CASE WHEN (SELECT Count(1) FROM INV1 INNER JOIN OINV ON INV1."DocEntry" = OINV."DocEntry" AND "TrgetEntry" IS NULL INNER JOIN OJDT ON OINV."TransId" = OJDT."TransId" WHERE OINV."U_SCGD_Cod_Unidad" = '{0}' AND OINV."DocType" = '{5}' AND OJDT."TransId" NOT IN (SELECT "U_NoAsient" FROM "@SCGD_GRLINES" L INNER JOIN "@SCGD_GOODRECEIVE" GR ON GR."DocEntry" = L."DocEntry" AND GR."U_Unidad" = '{0}' AND "U_NoAsient" IS NOT NULL) AND OINV."DocDate" <= '{4}') > 0 THEN 1 ELSE CASE WHEN (SELECT Count(1) FROM OIGE INNER JOIN IGE1 ON IGE1."DocEntry" = OIGE."DocEntry" INNER JOIN OJDT ON OIGE."TransId" = OJDT."TransId" WHERE ( OIGE."U_SCGD_Procesad" = 1 ) AND ( OIGE."U_SCGD_Cod_Unidad" = '{0}' ) AND ( OIGE."U_SCGD_Num_Vehiculo" IS NOT NULL ) AND ( OJDT."RefDate" <= '{4}' ) AND ( OJDT."TransId" NOT IN (SELECT L."U_NoAsient" FROM "@SCGD_GRLINES" L INNER JOIN "@SCGD_GOODRECEIVE" GR ON GR."DocEntry" = L."DocEntry" AND GR."U_Unidad" = '{0}' AND L."U_NoAsient" IS NOT NULL) )) > 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END END END END END END END END FROM DUMMY

data.name: HANA_QueryCosteosAsientos
data.value: SELECT Count(1) FROM "JDT1" "JDT1_1" INNER JOIN "OJDT" "OJDT_1" ON "JDT1_1"."TransId" = "OJDT_1"."TransId" LEFT OUTER JOIN "ORTT" "ORTT_1" ON "OJDT_1"."RefDate" = "ORTT_1"."RateDate" AND ( "ORTT_1"."Currency" = "JDT1_1"."FCCurrency" OR ( "JDT1_1"."FCCurrency" IS NULL OR "JDT1_1"."FCCurrency" = '{2}' ) AND "ORTT_1"."Currency" = '{1}' ) WHERE ( "JDT1_1"."U_SCGD_Cod_Unidad" = '{0}' ) AND ( "JDT1_1"."SYSDeb" <> 0 ) AND ( "OJDT_1"."TransId" NOT IN (SELECT "L"."U_NoAsient" FROM "@SCGD_GRLINES" "L" INNER JOIN "@SCGD_GOODRECEIVE" "GR" ON "GR"."DocEntry" = "L"."DocEntry" AND "GR"."U_Unidad" = '{0}' AND "L"."U_NoAsient" IS NOT NULL) ) AND ( "OJDT_1"."RefDate" <= '{3}' ) AND ( "JDT1_1"."U_SCGD_Cod_Tran" IN (SELECT "Code" FROM "@SCGD_TRAN_COMP" "@SCGD_TRAN_COMP_7") ) OR ( "JDT1_1"."U_SCGD_Cod_Unidad" = '{0}' ) AND ( "OJDT_1"."TransId" NOT IN (SELECT "L"."U_NoAsient" FROM "@SCGD_GRLINES" "L" INNER JOIN "@SCGD_GOODRECEIVE" "GR" ON "GR"."DocEntry" = "L"."DocEntry" AND "GR"."U_Unidad" = '{0}' AND "L"."U_NoAsient" IS NOT NULL) ) AND ( "OJDT_1"."RefDate" <= '{3}' ) AND ( "JDT1_1"."U_SCGD_Cod_Unidad" IN (SELECT "Code" FROM "@SCGD_TRAN_COMP" "@SCGD_TRAN_COMP_5") ) AND ( "JDT1_1"."FCDebit" <> 0 ) OR ( "JDT1_1"."U_SCGD_Cod_Unidad" = '{0}' ) AND ( "OJDT_1"."TransId" NOT IN (SELECT "L"."U_NoAsient" FROM "@SCGD_GRLINES" "L" INNER JOIN "@SCGD_GOODRECEIVE" "GR" ON "GR"."DocEntry" = "L"."DocEntry" AND "GR"."U_Unidad" = '{0}' AND "L"."U_NoAsient" IS NOT NULL) ) AND ( "OJDT_1"."RefDate" <= '{3}' ) AND ( "JDT1_1"."U_SCGD_Cod_Tran" IN (SELECT "Code" FROM "@SCGD_TRAN_COMP" "@SCGD_TRAN_COMP_4") ) AND ( "JDT1_1"."Debit" <> 0 )

data.name: HANA_QueryCosteosAsientos2
data.value: (SELECT Count(1) FROM "JDT1" "JDT1" INNER JOIN "OJDT" "OJDT" ON "JDT1"."TransId" = "OJDT"."TransId" LEFT OUTER JOIN "ORTT" "ORTT" ON "OJDT"."RefDate" = "ORTT"."RateDate" AND ( "ORTT"."Currency" = "JDT1"."FCCurrency" OR ( "JDT1"."FCCurrency" IS NULL OR "JDT1"."FCCurrency" = '{2}' ) AND "ORTT"."Currency" = '{1}' ) WHERE ( "JDT1"."U_SCGD_Cod_Unidad" = '{0}' ) AND ( "JDT1"."SYSCred" <> 0 ) AND ( "OJDT"."TransId" NOT IN (SELECT "L"."U_NoAsient" FROM "@SCGD_GRLINES" "L" INNER JOIN "@SCGD_GOODRECEIVE" "GR" ON "GR"."DocEntry" = "L"."DocEntry" AND "GR"."U_Unidad" = '{0}' AND "L"."U_NoAsient" IS NOT NULL) ) AND ( "OJDT"."RefDate" <= '{3}' ) AND ( "JDT1"."U_SCGD_Cod_Tran" IN (SELECT "Code" FROM "@SCGD_TRAN_COMP" "@SCGD_TRAN_COMP_3") ) OR ( "JDT1"."U_SCGD_Cod_Unidad" = '{0}' ) AND ( "OJDT"."TransId" NOT IN (SELECT "L"."U_NoAsient" FROM "@SCGD_GRLINES" "L" INNER JOIN "@SCGD_GOODRECEIVE" "GR" ON "GR"."DocEntry" = "L"."DocEntry" AND "GR"."U_Unidad" = '{0}' AND "L"."U_NoAsient" IS NOT NULL) ) AND ( "OJDT"."RefDate" <= '{3}' ) AND ( "JDT1"."U_SCGD_Cod_Tran" IN (SELECT "Code" FROM "@SCGD_TRAN_COMP" "@SCGD_TRAN_COMP_2") ) AND ( "JDT1"."fcCredit" <> 0 ) OR ( "JDT1"."U_SCGD_Cod_Unidad" = '{0}' ) AND ( "OJDT"."TransId" NOT IN (SELECT "L"."U_NoAsient" FROM "@SCGD_GRLINES" "L" INNER JOIN "@SCGD_GOODRECEIVE" "GR" ON "GR"."DocEntry" = "L"."DocEntry" AND "GR"."U_Unidad" = '{0}'AND "L"."U_NoAsient" IS NOT NULL) ) AND ( "OJDT"."RefDate" <= '{3}' ) AND ( "JDT1"."U_SCGD_Cod_Tran" IN (SELECT "Code" FROM "@SCGD_TRAN_COMP" "@SCGD_TRAN_COMP_1") ) AND ( "JDT1"."Credit" <> 0 ))

data.name: HANA_QueryCosteosFacCli
data.value: SELECT Count(1) FROM "INV1" INNER JOIN "OINV" ON "INV1"."DocEntry" = "OINV"."DocEntry" AND "TrgetEntry" IS NULL INNER JOIN "OJDT" ON "OINV"."TransId" = "OJDT"."TransId" WHERE "OINV"."U_SCGD_Cod_Unidad" = '{0}' AND "OINV"."DocType" = '{2}' AND "OJDT"."TransId" NOT IN (SELECT "U_NoAsient" FROM "@SCGD_GRLINES" "L" INNER JOIN "@SCGD_GOODRECEIVE" "GR" ON "GR"."DocEntry" = "L"."DocEntry" AND "GR"."U_Unidad" = '{0}' AND "U_NoAsient" IS NOT NULL) AND "OINV"."DocDate" <= '{1}'

data.name: HANA_QueryCosteosFacRes
data.value: SELECT Count(1) FROM "PCH1" INNER JOIN "OPCH" ON "PCH1"."DocEntry" = "OPCH"."DocEntry" INNER JOIN "OJDT" ON "OPCH"."TransId" = "OJDT"."TransId" WHERE ( "PCH1"."U_SCGD_Cod_Unid" = '{0}' ) AND ( "OPCH"."DocType" = '{2}' OR "OPCH"."DocType" = '{3}' ) AND ( "OJDT"."TransId" NOT IN (SELECT "L"."U_NoAsient" FROM "@SCGD_GRLINES" "L" INNER JOIN "@SCGD_GOODRECEIVE" "GR" ON "GR"."DocEntry" = "L"."DocEntry" AND "GR"."U_Unidad" = '{0}' AND "L"."U_NoAsient" IS NOT NULL) ) AND ( "OPCH"."DocDate" <= '{1}' ) AND ( "PCH1"."U_SCGD_Cod_Tran" IN (SELECT "Code" FROM "@SCGD_TRAN_COMP" "@SCGD_TRAN_COMP_1") )

data.name: HANA_QueryCosteosNotCre
data.value: SELECT Count(1) FROM "RPC1" INNER JOIN "ORPC" ON "RPC1"."DocEntry" = "ORPC"."DocEntry" AND "RPC1"."TrgetEntry" IS NULL INNER JOIN "OJDT" ON "ORPC"."TransId" = "OJDT"."TransId" WHERE ( "RPC1"."U_SCGD_Cod_Unid" = '{0}' ) AND ( "ORPC"."DocType" = '{2}' OR "ORPC"."DocType" = '{3}' ) AND ( "OJDT"."TransId" NOT IN (SELECT "L"."U_NoAsient" FROM "@SCGD_GRLINES" "L" INNER JOIN "@SCGD_GOODRECEIVE" "GR" ON "GR"."DocEntry" = "L"."DocEntry" AND "GR"."U_Unidad" = '{0}' AND "L"."U_NoAsient" IS NOT NULL) ) AND ( "ORPC"."DocDate" <= '{1}' ) AND ( "RPC1"."U_SCGD_Cod_Tran" IN (SELECT "Code" FROM "@SCGD_TRAN_COMP" "@SCGD_TRAN_COMP_1") )

data.name: HANA_QueryCosteosVehi
data.value: SELECT Count(1) AS "QTY" FROM "@SCGD_VEHICULO" WHERE ( "U_Cod_Unid" = '{0}' ) AND ( "U_SALINID" <> 0 ) AND ( "U_SALINID" IS NOT NULL )

data.name: HANA_QueryDocumentos
data.value: SELECT CASE WHEN '{0}' <> '' AND (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM "@SCGD_GOODISSUE" WHERE "U_Unidad" = '{0}') > 0 THEN 1 ELSE CASE WHEN '{0}' <> '' AND (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM "@SCGD_GOODRECEIVE" WHERE "U_Unidad" = '{0}') > 0 THEN 1 ELSE CASE WHEN '{1}' <> '' AND (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM "OQUT" WHERE "U_SCGD_Num_Vehiculo" = '{1}') > 0 THEN 1 ELSE CASE WHEN '{0}' <> '' AND (SELECT COUNT(1) AS "cou" FROM "@SCGD_CVENTA" WHERE "U_Cod_Unid" = '{0}' AND "U_Estado" <> 0) > 0 THEN 1 ELSE CASE WHEN '{0}' <> '' AND (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM "RPC1" WHERE "U_SCGD_Cod_Unid" = '{0}') > 0 THEN 1 ELSE CASE WHEN '{0}' <> '' AND (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM "PCH1" WHERE "U_SCGD_Cod_Unid" = '{0}') > 0 THEN 1 ELSE CASE WHEN '{0}' <> '' AND (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM "JDT1" WHERE "U_SCGD_Cod_Unidad" = '{0}') > 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END END END END END END END FROM DUMMY

data.name: HANA_QueryNombreEmpleadoXOT
data.value: SELECT T1."firstName" || ' ' || T1."lastName" FROM "OQUT" T0, "OHEM" T1 WHERE T0."OwnerCode" = T1."empID" AND T0."U_SCGD_Numero_OT" = '{0}'

data.name: QueryExpeXModelo
data.value: SELECT exm."Code", exm."Name", "U_Cod_Marca", "U_Cod_Modelo", "U_Cod_Estilo", "U_Num_Cili", "U_Cant_Puerta", "U_Cant_Pasaj", "U_Cant_Ejes", "U_Peso", "U_Cilindrada", "U_Potencia", "U_Categoria", "U_Marca_Mot", "U_Transmis", "U_Carroceria", "U_Tipo_Trac", "U_Tipo_Cabina", "U_Combusti", "U_GarantKM", "U_GarantTM", "U_Tipo_Techo", "U_Cod_Tec", "U_Cod_MarComer", cav."U_ArtVent", cav."Code" "CodeAV" FROM "@SCGD_ESPEXMODE" exm ¿#? LEFT JOIN "@SCGD_CONF_ART_VENTA" cav ¿#? ON exm."U_Cod_MarComer" = cav."Name" {0}

data.name: SQL_AsignacionesOTInterna
data.value: select distinct cc.Code ID, q1.U_SCGD_Sucur+'-'+Cast(q1.LineNum as varchar)+'-'+cc.Code as IDRepXOrd, itm.U_SCGD_T_Fase NoFase, q1.ItemCode, q1.U_SCGD_DurSt DuracionAprobada, cc.Code NoOrden, q1.Dscription ItemName, cc.U_Estad Estado, fp.Name Descripcion, emp.empID IDEmp, (emp.firstName + ' ' + emp.lastName) as NombreEmp, q1.docEntry as NumCot, q1.LineNum, 0 U_SCGD_DurSt, 0 U_SCGD_TiempoReal, 0 as Price from [@SCGD_CTRLCOL] cc with (nolock) inner Join QUT1 q1 with (nolock) on cc.code = q1.U_SCGD_NoOT and cc.U_IdAct = q1.U_SCGD_ID inner join OITM itm with (nolock) on q1.ItemCode = itm.ItemCode left join [@SCGD_FASEPRODUCCION] fp with (nolock) on itm.U_SCGD_T_Fase = fp.Code inner join OHEM emp with (nolock) on cc. U_Colab = emp.empID WHERE cc.Code = '{0}'

data.name: SQL_EdicionRegistroTiempo
data.value: SELECT T3."LineId", T4."empID", CONCAT(T4."firstName", CONCAT(' ', T4."lastName")) AS "Name", T2."Dscription" AS "Service", T3."U_CosRe" AS "RealCost", T3."U_CosEst" AS "StandardCost", T3."U_DFIni" AS "StartDate", T3."U_HFIni" AS "StartTime", T3."U_DFFin" AS "EndDate", T3."U_HFFin" AS "EndTime", T2."U_SCGD_DurSt" AS "StandardDuration", T4."U_SCGD_sALXHORA" AS "HourlyWage", ISNULL(T5."U_ExtraHourRate", 0) AS "ExtraHourRate", T3."U_TMin" AS "TotalMinutes", ISNULL(T4."U_SCGD_WorksWeekends", 'N') AS "WorksWeekends" FROM "@SCGD_OT" T0 WITH (nolock) INNER JOIN "OQUT" T1 WITH (nolock) ON T0."U_DocEntry" = T1."DocEntry" INNER JOIN "QUT1" T2 WITH (nolock) ON T1."DocEntry" = T2."DocEntry" INNER JOIN "@SCGD_CTRLCOL" T3 WITH (nolock) ON T0."Code" = T3."Code" AND T2."U_SCGD_ID" = T3."U_IdAct" INNER JOIN "OHEM" T4 WITH (nolock) ON T3."U_Colab" = T4."empID" INNER JOIN "@SCGD_CONF_SUCURSAL" T5 WITH (nolock) ON T0."U_Sucu" = T5."U_Sucurs" WHERE T0."Code" = '{0}' AND T3."U_Estad" IN ('{1}', '{2}') Order By T4."empID", T3."LineId"

data.name: SQL_ExisteOrdenCompraNC
data.value: SELECT COUNT(*) AS "Cuenta" FROM "RPC1" T0 WITH (nolock) INNER JOIN "PCH1" T1 WITH (nolock) ON T0."BaseEntry" = T1."DocEntry" AND T0."BaseLine" = T1."LineNum" AND T0."BaseType" = T1."ObjType" LEFT JOIN "PDN1" T2 WITH (nolock) ON T1."BaseEntry" = T2."DocEntry" AND T1."BaseLine" = T2."LineNum" AND T1."BaseType" = T2."ObjType" WHERE T0."DocEntry" = '{0}' AND (T1."BaseType" = '22' OR T2."BaseType" = '22')

data.name: SQL_QueryCosteos
data.value: SELECT CASE WHEN (SELECT Count(1) AS QTY FROM "@SCGD_VEHICULO" WITH (nolock) WHERE ( U_Cod_Unid = '{0}' ) AND ( U_SALINID <> 0 ) AND ( U_SALINID IS NOT NULL )) > 0 THEN 1 ELSE CASE WHEN (SELECT Count(1) FROM "@SCGD_VEHICULO" AS "@SCGD_VEHICULO_1" WITH (nolock) WHERE ( U_Cod_Unid = '{0}' ) AND ( U_SALINIC <> 0 ) AND ( U_SALINIC IS NOT NULL )) > 0 THEN 1 ELSE CASE WHEN (SELECT Count(1) FROM JDT1 AS JDT1_1 WITH (nolock) INNER JOIN OJDT AS OJDT_1 WITH (nolock) ON JDT1_1.TransId = OJDT_1.TransId LEFT OUTER JOIN ORTT AS ORTT_1 WITH (nolock) ON OJDT_1.RefDate = ORTT_1.RateDate AND ( ORTT_1.Currency = JDT1_1.FCCurrency OR ( JDT1_1.FCCurrency IS NULL OR JDT1_1.FCCurrency = '{3}' ) AND ORTT_1.Currency = '{1}' ) WHERE ( JDT1_1.U_SCGD_Cod_Unidad = '{0}' ) AND ( JDT1_1.SYSDeb <> 0 ) AND ( OJDT_1.TransId NOT IN (SELECT L.U_NoAsient FROM "@SCGD_GRLINES" AS L WITH (nolock) INNER JOIN "@SCGD_GOODRECEIVE" AS GR WITH (nolock) ON GR.DocEntry = L.DocEntry AND GR.U_Unidad = '{0}' AND L.U_NoAsient IS NOT NULL) ) AND ( OJDT_1.RefDate <= '{4}' ) AND ( JDT1_1.U_SCGD_Cod_Tran IN (SELECT Code FROM "@SCGD_TRAN_COMP" AS "@SCGD_TRAN_COMP_7" WITH (nolock) ) ) OR ( JDT1_1.U_SCGD_Cod_Unidad = '{0}' ) AND ( OJDT_1.TransId NOT IN (SELECT L.U_NoAsient FROM "@SCGD_GRLINES" AS L WITH (nolock ) INNER JOIN "@SCGD_GOODRECEIVE" AS GR WITH (nolock) ON GR.DocEntry = L.DocEntry AND GR.U_Unidad = '{0}' AND L.U_NoAsient IS NOT NULL) ) AND ( OJDT_1.RefDate <= '{4}' ) AND ( JDT1_1.U_SCGD_Cod_Unidad IN (SELECT Code FROM "@SCGD_TRAN_COMP" AS "@SCGD_TRAN_COMP_5" WITH (nolock) ) ) AND ( JDT1_1.FCDebit <> 0 ) OR ( JDT1_1.U_SCGD_Cod_Unidad = '{0}' ) AND ( OJDT_1.TransId NOT IN (SELECT L.U_NoAsient FROM "@SCGD_GRLINES" AS L WITH (nolock ) INNER JOIN "@SCGD_GOODRECEIVE" AS GR WITH (nolock) ON GR.DocEntry = L.DocEntry AND GR.U_Unidad = '{0}' AND L.U_NoAsient IS NOT NULL) ) AND ( OJDT_1.RefDate <= '{4}' ) AND ( JDT1_1.U_SCGD_Cod_Tran IN (SELECT Code FROM "@SCGD_TRAN_COMP" AS "@SCGD_TRAN_COMP_4" WITH (nolock) ) ) AND ( JDT1_1.Debit <> 0 )) > 0 THEN 1 ELSE CASE WHEN (SELECT Count(1) FROM JDT1 AS JDT1 WITH (nolock) INNER JOIN OJDT AS OJDT WITH (nolock) ON JDT1.TransId = OJDT.TransId LEFT OUTER JOIN ORTT AS ORTT WITH (nolock) ON OJDT.RefDate = ORTT.RateDate AND ( ORTT.Currency = JDT1.FCCurrency OR ( JDT1.FCCurrency IS NULL OR JDT1.FCCurrency = '{2}' ) AND ORTT.Currency = '{1}' ) WHERE ( JDT1.U_SCGD_Cod_Unidad = '{0}' ) AND ( JDT1.SYSCred <> 0 ) AND ( OJDT.TransId NOT IN (SELECT L.U_NoAsient FROM "@SCGD_GRLINES" AS L WITH (nolock) INNER JOIN "@SCGD_GOODRECEIVE" AS GR WITH (nolock) ON GR.DocEntry = L.DocEntry AND GR.U_Unidad = '{0}' AND L.U_NoAsient IS NOT NULL) ) AND ( OJDT.RefDate <= '{4}' ) AND ( JDT1.U_SCGD_Cod_Tran IN (SELECT Code FROM "@SCGD_TRAN_COMP" AS "@SCGD_TRAN_COMP_3" WITH (nolock) ) ) OR ( JDT1.U_SCGD_Cod_Unidad = '{0}' ) AND ( OJDT.TransId NOT IN (SELECT L.U_NoAsient FROM "@SCGD_GRLINES" AS L WITH (nolock) INNER JOIN "@SCGD_GOODRECEIVE" AS GR WITH (nolock) ON GR.DocEntry = L.DocEntry AND GR.U_Unidad = '{0}' AND L.U_NoAsient IS NOT NULL) ) AND ( OJDT.RefDate <= '{4}' ) AND ( JDT1.U_SCGD_Cod_Tran IN (SELECT Code FROM "@SCGD_TRAN_COMP" AS "@SCGD_TRAN_COMP_2" WITH (nolock) ) ) AND ( JDT1.fcCredit <> 0 ) OR ( JDT1.U_SCGD_Cod_Unidad = '{0}' ) AND ( OJDT.TransId NOT IN (SELECT L.U_NoAsient FROM "@SCGD_GRLINES" AS L WITH (nolock) INNER JOIN "@SCGD_GOODRECEIVE" AS GR WITH (nolock) ON GR.DocEntry = L.DocEntry AND GR.U_Unidad = '{0}' AND L.U_NoAsient IS NOT NULL) ) AND ( OJDT.RefDate <= '{4}' ) AND ( JDT1.U_SCGD_Cod_Tran IN (SELECT Code FROM "@SCGD_TRAN_COMP" AS "@SCGD_TRAN_COMP_1" WITH (nolock) ) ) AND ( JDT1.Credit <> 0 )) > 0 THEN 1 ELSE CASE WHEN (SELECT Count(1) FROM PCH1 WITH (nolock) INNER JOIN OPCH WITH (nolock) ON PCH1.DocEntry = OPCH.DocEntry INNER JOIN OJDT WITH (nolock) ON OPCH.TransId = OJDT.TransId WHERE ( PCH1.U_SCGD_Cod_Unid = '{0}' ) AND ( OPCH.DocType = '{5}' OR OPCH.DocType = '{6}' ) AND ( OJDT.TransId NOT IN (SELECT L.U_NoAsient FROM "@SCGD_GRLINES" AS L WITH (nolock) INNER JOIN "@SCGD_GOODRECEIVE" AS GR WITH (nolock) ON GR.DocEntry = L.DocEntry AND GR.U_Unidad = '{0}' AND L.U_NoAsient IS NOT NULL) ) AND ( OPCH.DocDate <= '{4}' ) AND ( PCH1.U_SCGD_Cod_Tran IN (SELECT Code FROM "@SCGD_TRAN_COMP" AS "@SCGD_TRAN_COMP_1" WITH (nolock) ) )) > 0 THEN 1 ELSE CASE WHEN (SELECT Count(1) FROM RPC1 WITH (nolock) INNER JOIN ORPC WITH (nolock) ON RPC1.DocEntry = ORPC.DocEntry AND RPC1.TrgetEntry IS NULL INNER JOIN OJDT WITH (nolock) ON ORPC.TransId = OJDT.TransId WHERE ( RPC1.U_SCGD_Cod_Unid = '{0}' ) AND ( ORPC.DocType = '{5}' OR ORPC.DocType = '{6}' ) AND ( OJDT.TransId NOT IN (SELECT L.U_NoAsient FROM "@SCGD_GRLINES" AS L WITH (nolock) INNER JOIN "@SCGD_GOODRECEIVE" AS GR WITH (nolock) ON GR.DocEntry = L.DocEntry AND GR.U_Unidad = '{0}' AND L.U_NoAsient IS NOT NULL) ) AND ( ORPC.DocDate <= '{4}' ) AND ( RPC1.U_SCGD_Cod_Tran IN (SELECT Code FROM "@SCGD_TRAN_COMP" AS "@SCGD_TRAN_COMP_1" WITH (nolock) ) )) > 0 THEN 1 ELSE CASE WHEN (SELECT Count(1) FROM INV1 WITH (nolock) INNER JOIN OINV WITH (nolock) ON INV1.DocEntry = OINV.DocEntry AND TrgetEntry IS NULL INNER JOIN OJDT WITH (nolock) ON OINV.TransId = OJDT.TransId WHERE OINV.U_SCGD_Cod_Unidad = '{0}' AND OINV.DocType = '{5}' AND OJDT.TransId NOT IN (SELECT U_NoAsient FROM "@SCGD_GRLINES" L WITH (nolock) INNER JOIN "@SCGD_GOODRECEIVE" GR WITH (nolock) ON GR.DocEntry = L.DocEntry AND GR.U_Unidad = '{0}' AND U_NoAsient IS NOT NULL ) AND OINV.DocDate <= '{4}' ) > 0 THEN 1 ELSE CASE WHEN (SELECT Count(1) FROM OIGE WITH (nolock) INNER JOIN IGE1 WITH (nolock) ON IGE1.DocEntry = OIGE.DocEntry INNER JOIN OJDT WITH (nolock) ON OIGE.TransId = OJDT.TransId WHERE ( OIGE.U_SCGD_Procesad = 1 ) AND ( OIGE.U_SCGD_Cod_Unidad = '{0}' ) AND ( OIGE.U_SCGD_Num_Vehiculo IS NOT NULL ) AND ( OJDT.RefDate <= '{4}' ) AND ( OJDT.TransId NOT IN (SELECT L.U_NoAsient FROM "@SCGD_GRLINES" AS L WITH (nolock) INNER JOIN "@SCGD_GOODRECEIVE" AS GR WITH (nolock) ON GR.DocEntry = L.DocEntry AND GR.U_Unidad = '{0}' AND L.U_NoAsient IS NOT NULL) )) > 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END END END END END END END END

data.value: SELECT Count(1) FROM JDT1 AS JDT1_1 WITH (nolock) INNER JOIN OJDT AS OJDT_1 WITH (nolock) ON JDT1_1.TransId = OJDT_1.TransId LEFT OUTER JOIN ORTT AS ORTT_1 WITH (nolock) ON OJDT_1.RefDate = ORTT_1.RateDate AND ( ORTT_1.Currency = JDT1_1.FCCurrency OR ( JDT1_1.FCCurrency IS NULL OR JDT1_1.FCCurrency = '{2}' ) AND ORTT_1.Currency = '{1}' ) WHERE ( JDT1_1.U_SCGD_Cod_Unidad = '{0}' ) AND ( JDT1_1.SYSDeb <> 0 ) AND ( OJDT_1.TransId NOT IN (SELECT L.U_NoAsient FROM "@SCGD_GRLINES" AS L WITH (nolock) INNER JOIN "@SCGD_GOODRECEIVE" AS GR WITH (nolock) ON GR.DocEntry = L.DocEntry AND GR.U_Unidad = '{0}' AND L.U_NoAsient IS NOT NULL) ) AND ( OJDT_1.RefDate <= '{3}' ) AND ( JDT1_1.U_SCGD_Cod_Tran IN (SELECT Code FROM "@SCGD_TRAN_COMP" AS "@SCGD_TRAN_COMP_7" WITH (nolock) ) ) OR ( JDT1_1.U_SCGD_Cod_Unidad = '{0}' ) AND ( OJDT_1.TransId NOT IN (SELECT L.U_NoAsient FROM "@SCGD_GRLINES" AS L WITH (nolock ) INNER JOIN "@SCGD_GOODRECEIVE" AS GR WITH (nolock) ON GR.DocEntry = L.DocEntry AND GR.U_Unidad = '{0}' AND L.U_NoAsient IS NOT NULL) ) AND ( OJDT_1.RefDate <= '{3}' ) AND ( JDT1_1.U_SCGD_Cod_Unidad IN (SELECT Code FROM "@SCGD_TRAN_COMP" AS "@SCGD_TRAN_COMP_5" WITH (nolock) ) ) AND ( JDT1_1.FCDebit <> 0 ) OR ( JDT1_1.U_SCGD_Cod_Unidad = '{0}' ) AND ( OJDT_1.TransId NOT IN (SELECT L.U_NoAsient FROM "@SCGD_GRLINES" AS L WITH (nolock ) INNER JOIN "@SCGD_GOODRECEIVE" AS GR WITH (nolock) ON GR.DocEntry = L.DocEntry AND GR.U_Unidad = '{0}' AND L.U_NoAsient IS NOT NULL) ) AND ( OJDT_1.RefDate <= '{3}' ) AND ( JDT1_1.U_SCGD_Cod_Tran IN (SELECT Code FROM "@SCGD_TRAN_COMP" AS "@SCGD_TRAN_COMP_4" WITH (nolock) ) ) AND ( JDT1_1.Debit <> 0 )

data.name: SQL_QueryDocumentos
data.value: Select Case when '{0}' <> '' AND (select count(1) cou from [@SCGD_CVENTA] with (nolock) where U_Cod_Unid = '{0}' and U_Estado <> 0 ) > 0 then 1 else Case when '{0}' <> '' AND (select count(1) from [@SCGD_GOODISSUE] with (nolock) where U_Unidad = '{0}') > 0 then 1 else Case when '{0}' <> '' AND (select count(1) from [@SCGD_GOODRECEIVE] with (nolock) where U_Unidad = '{0}' ) > 0 then 1 else Case when '{1}' <> '' AND (select count(1) from OQUT with (nolock) where U_SCGD_Num_Vehiculo = '{1}') > 0 then 1 else Case when '{0}' <> '' AND (select count(1) from RPC1 with (nolock) where U_SCGD_Cod_Unid = '{0}' ) > 0 then 1 else Case when '{0}' <> '' AND (select count(1) from PCH1 with (nolock) where U_SCGD_Cod_Unid = '{0}' ) > 0 then 1 else Case when '{0}' <> '' AND (select count(1) from JDT1 with (nolock) where U_SCGD_Cod_Unidad = '{0}') > 0 then 1 else 0 End End End End End End End

data.name: SQL_QueryInconsisCompras
data.value:
DECLARE @AprobadoSI AS INT SET @AprobadoSI = 1 DECLARE @TrasladadoNO AS INT SET @TrasladadoNO = 1
DECLARE @TransaccionCompra AS VARCHAR(1) SET @TransaccionCompra = '2'
SELECT 'N' AS 'Check', T0.DocEntry, T1.LineNum, T1.ItemCode, T1.Dscription, T2.Quantity AS 'CantidadEntrada', T1.U_SCGD_TipArt AS 'ArtType', @TransaccionCompra AS 'TrnsType', CAST('' AS varchar(254)) AS 'Remarks'
FROM "OQUT" T0 WITH (nolock) INNER JOIN "QUT1" T1 WITH (nolock) ON T0.DocEntry = T1.DocEntry INNER JOIN "PDN1" T2 WITH (nolock) ON T1.U_SCGD_ID = T2.U_SCGD_ID --Entrada de Mercancías Compras WHERE T0.DocStatus = 'O' AND T0.U_SCGD_Estado_CotID <> '4' AND T0.CreateDate >= DATEADD(MM, -2, GETDATE()) AND T2.DocDate >= DATEADD(MM, -2, GETDATE()) AND T1.U_SCGD_Aprobado = @AprobadoSI AND T1.U_SCGD_Traslad = @TrasladadoNO AND T1.U_SCGD_Compra = 'Y' AND (T1.U_SCGD_CSol> 0 OR T1.U_SCGD_CPen > 0) AND T1.U_SCGD_CRec = 0
UNION
SELECT 'N' AS 'Check', T0.DocEntry, T1.LineNum, T1.ItemCode, T1.Dscription, T2.Quantity AS 'CantidadEntrada', T1.U_SCGD_TipArt AS 'ArtType', @TransaccionCompra AS 'TrnsType', CAST('' AS varchar(254)) AS 'Remarks'
FROM "OQUT" T0 WITH (nolock) INNER JOIN "QUT1" T1 WITH (nolock) ON T0.DocEntry = T1.DocEntry INNER JOIN "PCH1" T2 WITH (nolock) ON T1.U_SCGD_ID = T2.U_SCGD_ID --Factura de Compras WHERE T0.DocStatus = 'O' AND T0.U_SCGD_Estado_CotID <> '4' AND T0.CreateDate >= DATEADD(MM, -2, GETDATE()) AND T2.DocDate >= DATEADD(MM, -2, GETDATE()) AND T1.U_SCGD_Aprobado = @AprobadoSI AND T1.U_SCGD_Traslad = @TrasladadoNO AND T1.U_SCGD_Compra = 'Y' AND (T1.U_SCGD_CSol> 0 OR T1.U_SCGD_CPen > 0) AND T1.U_SCGD_CRec = 0

data.name: SQL_QueryInconsisRequisiciones
data.value: SELECT 'N' AS 'Check', T0.DocEntry, T1.LineNum, T1.ItemCode, T1.Dscription, T3.U_SCGD_CantRec AS 'CantidadEntrada', T1.U_SCGD_TipArt AS 'ArtType', '1' AS 'TrnsType', CAST('' AS varchar(254)) AS 'Remarks' FROM "OQUT" T0 WITH (nolock) INNER JOIN "QUT1" T1 WITH (nolock) ON T0.DocEntry = T1.DocEntry INNER JOIN "@SCGD_REQUISICIONES" T2 WITH (nolock) ON T0.U_SCGD_Numero_OT = T2.U_SCGD_NoOrden INNER JOIN "@SCGD_LINEAS_REQ" T3 WITH (nolock) ON T2.DocEntry = T3.DocEntry AND T1.U_SCGD_ID = T3.U_SCGD_ID WHERE T0.DocStatus = 'O' AND T0.CreateDate>=DATEADD(MM, -2, getdate()) AND T0.U_SCGD_Estado_CotID <> '4' AND T1.U_SCGD_Aprobado = 1 AND T1.U_SCGD_Traslad = 4 AND T1.U_SCGD_TipArt IN ('1', '3') AND T1.U_SCGD_CPBo > 0 AND T3.U_SCGD_CodEst = 2

data.name: SQL_QueryNombreEmpleadoXOT
data.value: Select T1."firstName" + ' ' + T1."lastName" From [OQUT] T0 ,[OHEM] T1 Where T0."OwnerCode" = T1."empID" and T0."U_SCGD_Numero_OT" = '{0}'

data.name: SQL_QueryOcupacionMensual
data.value:
SELECT X1.name, X1.Empleado, CAST(SUM(X1.Enero) AS nvarchar(20)) AS 'Enero', CAST(SUM(X1.Febrero) AS nvarchar(20)) AS 'Febrero', CAST(SUM(X1.Marzo) AS nvarchar(20)) AS 'Marzo', CAST(SUM(X1.Abril) AS nvarchar(20)) AS 'Abril', CAST(SUM(X1.Mayo) AS nvarchar(20)) AS 'Mayo', CAST(SUM(X1.Junio) AS nvarchar(20)) AS 'Junio', CAST(SUM(X1.Julio) AS nvarchar(20)) AS 'Julio', CAST(SUM(X1.Agosto) AS nvarchar(20)) AS 'Agosto', CAST(SUM(X1.Septiembre) AS nvarchar(20)) AS 'Septiembre', CAST(SUM(X1.Octubre) AS nvarchar(20)) AS 'Octubre', CAST(SUM(X1.Noviembre) AS nvarchar(20)) AS 'Noviembre', CAST(SUM(X1.Diciembre) AS nvarchar(20)) AS 'Diciembre' FROM(
--Ocupación mensual de los asesores SELECT T1.name, (T0."lastName" + ' ' + T0."firstName") AS 'Empleado', ISNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN T2.U_FechaCita Between '{0}' AND '{1}' THEN CAST(ISNULL(T3.U_IntervaloCitas, 15) AS int) ELSE 0 END),0) AS 'Enero', ISNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN T2.U_FechaCita Between '{2}' AND '{3}' THEN CAST(ISNULL(T3.U_IntervaloCitas, 15) AS int) ELSE 0 END),0) AS 'Febrero', ISNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN T2.U_FechaCita Between '{4}' AND '{5}' THEN CAST(ISNULL(T3.U_IntervaloCitas, 15) AS int) ELSE 0 END),0) AS 'Marzo', ISNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN T2.U_FechaCita Between '{6}' AND '{7}' THEN CAST(ISNULL(T3.U_IntervaloCitas, 15) AS int) ELSE 0 END),0) AS 'Abril', ISNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN T2.U_FechaCita Between '{8}' AND '{9}' THEN CAST(ISNULL(T3.U_IntervaloCitas, 15) AS int) ELSE 0 END),0) AS 'Mayo', ISNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN T2.U_FechaCita Between '{10}' AND '{11}' THEN CAST(ISNULL(T3.U_IntervaloCitas, 15) AS int) ELSE 0 END),0) AS 'Junio', ISNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN T2.U_FechaCita Between '{12}' AND '{13}' THEN CAST(ISNULL(T3.U_IntervaloCitas, 15) AS int) ELSE 0 END),0) AS 'Julio', ISNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN T2.U_FechaCita Between '{14}' AND '{15}' THEN CAST(ISNULL(T3.U_IntervaloCitas, 15) AS int) ELSE 0 END),0) AS 'Agosto', ISNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN T2.U_FechaCita Between '{16}' AND '{17}' THEN CAST(ISNULL(T3.U_IntervaloCitas, 15) AS int) ELSE 0 END),0) AS 'Septiembre', ISNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN T2.U_FechaCita Between '{18}' AND '{19}' THEN CAST(ISNULL(T3.U_IntervaloCitas, 15) AS int) ELSE 0 END),0) AS 'Octubre', ISNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN T2.U_FechaCita Between '{20}' AND '{21}' THEN CAST(ISNULL(T3.U_IntervaloCitas, 15) AS int) ELSE 0 END),0) AS 'Noviembre', ISNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN T2.U_FechaCita Between '{22}' AND '{23}' THEN CAST(ISNULL(T3.U_IntervaloCitas, 15) AS int) ELSE 0 END),0) AS 'Diciembre'
FROM "OHEM" T0 LEFT JOIN "OHPS" T1 ON T0.position = T1.posID INNER JOIN "@SCGD_CITA" T2 ON T0.empID = T2.U_Cod_Asesor INNER JOIN "@SCGD_AGENDA" T3 ON T2.U_Cod_Agenda = T3.DocNum WHERE T0."U_SCGD_TipoEmp" = 'A' AND T0."branch" = '{24}' AND T2."U_FechaCita" Between '{0}' AND '{23}' AND T2."U_Estado" <> '3' AND T2."U_Cod_Sucursal" = '{24}' Group By T1.name, T0.lastName, T0.firstName
UNION ALL
--Ocupación mensual de los técnicos sin orden de trabajo SELECT T1.name, (T0."lastName" + ' ' + T0."firstName") AS 'Empleado', ISNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN T2.U_FechaCita Between '{0}' AND '{1}' THEN ISNULL(T4.U_SCGD_DurSt, 0) ELSE 0 END),0) AS 'Enero', ISNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN T2.U_FechaCita Between '{2}' AND '{3}' THEN ISNULL(T4.U_SCGD_DurSt, 0) ELSE 0 END),0) AS 'Febrero', ISNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN T2.U_FechaCita Between '{4}' AND '{5}' THEN ISNULL(T4.U_SCGD_DurSt, 0) ELSE 0 END),0) AS 'Marzo', ISNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN T2.U_FechaCita Between '{6}' AND '{7}' THEN ISNULL(T4.U_SCGD_DurSt, 0) ELSE 0 END),0) AS 'Abril', ISNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN T2.U_FechaCita Between '{8}' AND '{9}' THEN ISNULL(T4.U_SCGD_DurSt, 0) ELSE 0 END),0) AS 'Mayo', ISNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN T2.U_FechaCita Between '{10}' AND '{11}' THEN ISNULL(T4.U_SCGD_DurSt, 0) ELSE 0 END),0) AS 'Junio', ISNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN T2.U_FechaCita Between '{12}' AND '{13}' THEN ISNULL(T4.U_SCGD_DurSt, 0) ELSE 0 END),0) AS 'Julio', ISNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN T2.U_FechaCita Between '{14}' AND '{15}' THEN ISNULL(T4.U_SCGD_DurSt, 0) ELSE 0 END),0) AS 'Agosto', ISNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN T2.U_FechaCita Between '{16}' AND '{17}' THEN ISNULL(T4.U_SCGD_DurSt, 0) ELSE 0 END),0) AS 'Septiembre', ISNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN T2.U_FechaCita Between '{18}' AND '{19}' THEN ISNULL(T4.U_SCGD_DurSt, 0) ELSE 0 END),0) AS 'Octubre', ISNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN T2.U_FechaCita Between '{20}' AND '{21}' THEN ISNULL(T4.U_SCGD_DurSt, 0) ELSE 0 END),0) AS 'Noviembre', ISNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN T2.U_FechaCita Between '{22}' AND '{23}' THEN ISNULL(T4.U_SCGD_DurSt, 0) ELSE 0 END),0) AS 'Diciembre'
FROM "OHEM" T0 LEFT JOIN "OHPS" T1 ON T0.position = T1.posID INNER JOIN "@SCGD_CITA" T2 ON T0.empID = T2.U_Cod_Tecnico INNER JOIN "OQUT" T3 ON T2."U_Num_Cot" = T3."DocEntry" INNER JOIN "QUT1" T4 ON T4.DocEntry = T3.DocEntry WHERE T0."U_SCGD_TipoEmp" = 'T' AND T0."branch" = '{24}' AND T2."U_FechaCita" Between '{0}' AND '{23}' AND T2."U_Estado" <> '3' AND T2."U_Cod_Sucursal" = '{24}' AND T3.U_SCGD_Numero_OT IS NULL Group By T1.name, T0.lastName, T0.firstName
UNION ALL
--Ocupación mensual con actividades asignadas y orden de trabajo SELECT T1.name, (T0."lastName" + ' ' + T0."firstName") AS 'Empleado', ISNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN T2.U_FechPro Between '{0}' AND '{1}' THEN ISNULL(T4.U_SCGD_DurSt, 0) ELSE 0 END),0) AS 'Enero', ISNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN T2.U_FechPro Between '{2}' AND '{3}' THEN ISNULL(T4.U_SCGD_DurSt, 0) ELSE 0 END),0) AS 'Febrero', ISNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN T2.U_FechPro Between '{4}' AND '{5}' THEN ISNULL(T4.U_SCGD_DurSt, 0) ELSE 0 END),0) AS 'Marzo', ISNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN T2.U_FechPro Between '{6}' AND '{7}' THEN ISNULL(T4.U_SCGD_DurSt, 0) ELSE 0 END),0) AS 'Abril', ISNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN T2.U_FechPro Between '{8}' AND '{9}' THEN ISNULL(T4.U_SCGD_DurSt, 0) ELSE 0 END),0) AS 'Mayo', ISNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN T2.U_FechPro Between '{10}' AND '{11}' THEN ISNULL(T4.U_SCGD_DurSt, 0) ELSE 0 END),0) AS 'Junio', ISNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN T2.U_FechPro Between '{12}' AND '{13}' THEN ISNULL(T4.U_SCGD_DurSt, 0) ELSE 0 END),0) AS 'Julio', ISNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN T2.U_FechPro Between '{14}' AND '{15}' THEN ISNULL(T4.U_SCGD_DurSt, 0) ELSE 0 END),0) AS 'Agosto', ISNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN T2.U_FechPro Between '{16}' AND '{17}' THEN ISNULL(T4.U_SCGD_DurSt, 0) ELSE 0 END),0) AS 'Septiembre', ISNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN T2.U_FechPro Between '{18}' AND '{19}' THEN ISNULL(T4.U_SCGD_DurSt, 0) ELSE 0 END),0) AS 'Octubre', ISNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN T2.U_FechPro Between '{20}' AND '{21}' THEN ISNULL(T4.U_SCGD_DurSt, 0) ELSE 0 END),0) AS 'Noviembre', ISNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN T2.U_FechPro Between '{22}' AND '{23}' THEN ISNULL(T4.U_SCGD_DurSt, 0) ELSE 0 END),0) AS 'Diciembre'
FROM "OHEM" T0 LEFT JOIN "OHPS" T1 ON T0.position = T1.posID INNER JOIN "@SCGD_CTRLCOL" T2 ON T2.U_Colab = T0.empID INNER JOIN OQUT T3 ON T2.Code = T3.U_SCGD_Numero_OT INNER JOIN QUT1 T4 ON T3.DocEntry = T4.DocEntry WHERE T0."branch" = '{24}' AND T3.U_SCGD_idSucursal = '{24}' --T0."U_SCGD_TipoEmp" = 'T' AND AND T2.U_FechPro Between '{0}' AND '{23}' AND T2.U_IdAct = T4.U_SCGD_ID AND T2.LineId = (SELECT TOP 1 S0.LineId FROM "@SCGD_CTRLCOL" S0 WHERE S0.Code = T3.U_SCGD_Numero_OT AND S0.U_IdAct = T2.U_IdAct AND S0.U_Colab = T0.empID) AND T3.U_SCGD_Numero_OT IS NOT NULL
Group By T1.name, T0.lastName, T0.firstName
UNION ALL
--Bloqueos de los técnicos por meses SELECT T1.name, (T0."lastName" + ' ' + T0."firstName") AS 'Empleado', (SELECT -1 * ISNULL(SUM((S1.U_HoraF - S1.U_HorI) / 100),0) FROM "@SCGD_BLOCMEC" S1 WHERE S1.U_IdSucu = '{24}' AND S1.U_FechI Between '{0}' AND '{1}' AND S1.U_IdMec = T0.empID) AS 'Enero', (SELECT -1 * ISNULL(SUM((S1.U_HoraF - S1.U_HorI) / 100),0) FROM "@SCGD_BLOCMEC" S1 WHERE S1.U_IdSucu = '{24}' AND S1.U_FechI Between '{2}' AND '{3}' AND S1.U_IdMec = T0.empID) AS 'Febrero', (SELECT -1 * ISNULL(SUM((S1.U_HoraF - S1.U_HorI) / 100),0) FROM "@SCGD_BLOCMEC" S1 WHERE S1.U_IdSucu = '{24}' AND S1.U_FechI Between '{4}' AND '{5}' AND S1.U_IdMec = T0.empID) AS 'Marzo', (SELECT -1 * ISNULL(SUM((S1.U_HoraF - S1.U_HorI) / 100),0) FROM "@SCGD_BLOCMEC" S1 WHERE S1.U_IdSucu = '{24}' AND S1.U_FechI Between '{6}' AND '{7}' AND S1.U_IdMec = T0.empID) AS 'Abril', (SELECT -1 * ISNULL(SUM((S1.U_HoraF - S1.U_HorI) / 100),0) FROM "@SCGD_BLOCMEC" S1 WHERE S1.U_IdSucu = '{24}' AND S1.U_FechI Between '{8}' AND '{9}' AND S1.U_IdMec = T0.empID) AS 'Mayo', (SELECT -1 * ISNULL(SUM((S1.U_HoraF - S1.U_HorI) / 100),0) FROM "@SCGD_BLOCMEC" S1 WHERE S1.U_IdSucu = '{24}' AND S1.U_FechI Between '{10}' AND '{11}' AND S1.U_IdMec = T0.empID) AS 'Junio', (SELECT -1 * ISNULL(SUM((S1.U_HoraF - S1.U_HorI) / 100),0) FROM "@SCGD_BLOCMEC" S1 WHERE S1.U_IdSucu = '{24}' AND S1.U_FechI Between '{12}' AND '{13}' AND S1.U_IdMec = T0.empID) AS 'Julio', (SELECT -1 * ISNULL(SUM((S1.U_HoraF - S1.U_HorI) / 100),0) FROM "@SCGD_BLOCMEC" S1 WHERE S1.U_IdSucu = '{24}' AND S1.U_FechI Between '{14}' AND '{15}' AND S1.U_IdMec = T0.empID) AS 'Agosto', (SELECT -1 * ISNULL(SUM((S1.U_HoraF - S1.U_HorI) / 100),0) FROM "@SCGD_BLOCMEC" S1 WHERE S1.U_IdSucu = '{24}' AND S1.U_FechI Between '{16}' AND '{17}' AND S1.U_IdMec = T0.empID) AS 'Septiembre', (SELECT -1 * ISNULL(SUM((S1.U_HoraF - S1.U_HorI) / 100),0) FROM "@SCGD_BLOCMEC" S1 WHERE S1.U_IdSucu = '{24}' AND S1.U_FechI Between '{18}' AND '{19}' AND S1.U_IdMec = T0.empID) AS 'Octubre', (SELECT -1 * ISNULL(SUM((S1.U_HoraF - S1.U_HorI) / 100),0) FROM "@SCGD_BLOCMEC" S1 WHERE S1.U_IdSucu = '{24}' AND S1.U_FechI Between '{20}' AND '{21}' AND S1.U_IdMec = T0.empID) AS 'Noviembre', (SELECT -1 * ISNULL(SUM((S1.U_HoraF - S1.U_HorI) / 100),0) FROM "@SCGD_BLOCMEC" S1 WHERE S1.U_IdSucu = '{24}' AND S1.U_FechI Between '{22}' AND '{23}' AND S1.U_IdMec = T0.empID) AS 'Diciembre'
FROM "OHEM" T0 LEFT JOIN "OHPS" T1 ON T0.position = T1.posID WHERE T0."U_SCGD_TipoEmp" = 'T' AND T0."branch" = '{24}'
UNION ALL
--Query para poder mostrar todos los empleados de la sucursal aunque no tengan citas ni actividades asignadas SELECT T1.name, (T0."lastName" + ' ' + T0."firstName") AS 'Empleado', 0 AS 'Enero', 0 AS 'Febrero', 0 AS 'Marzo', 0 AS 'Abril', 0 AS 'Mayo', 0 AS 'Junio', 0 AS 'Julio', 0 AS 'Agosto', 0 AS 'Septiembre', 0 AS 'Octubre', 0 AS 'Noviembre', 0 AS 'Diciembre' FROM "OHEM" T0 LEFT JOIN "OHPS" T1 ON T0.position = T1.posID WHERE T0.branch = '{24}' AND T0.U_SCGD_TipoEmp IS NOT NULL
) X1 Group By X1.Empleado, X1.name Order By X1.Empleado

data.name: SQL_QueryOcupacionSemanal
data.value:
SELECT X1.name, X1.Empleado, CAST(SUM(X1.Lunes) AS nvarchar(20)) AS 'Lunes', CAST(SUM(X1.Martes) AS nvarchar(20)) AS 'Martes', CAST(SUM(X1.Miercoles) AS nvarchar(20)) AS 'Miercoles', CAST(SUM(X1.Jueves) AS nvarchar(20)) AS 'Jueves', CAST(SUM(X1.Viernes) AS nvarchar(20)) AS 'Viernes', CAST(SUM(X1.Sabado) AS nvarchar(20)) AS 'Sabado', CAST(SUM(X1.Domingo) AS nvarchar(20)) AS 'Domingo', CAST(SUM(X1.LunesS2) AS nvarchar(20)) AS 'LunesS2', CAST(SUM(X1.MartesS2) AS nvarchar(20)) AS 'MartesS2', CAST(SUM(X1.MiercolesS2) AS nvarchar(20)) AS 'MiercolesS2', CAST(SUM(X1.JuevesS2) AS nvarchar(20)) AS 'JuevesS2', CAST(SUM(X1.ViernesS2) AS nvarchar(20)) AS 'ViernesS2', CAST(SUM(X1.SabadoS2) AS nvarchar(20)) AS 'SabadoS2', CAST(SUM(X1.DomingoS2) AS nvarchar(20)) AS 'DomingoS2'
FROM (
--Ocupación semanal de los asesores SELECT T1.name, (T0."lastName" + ' ' + T0."firstName") AS 'Empleado', ISNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN T2.U_FechaCita = '{0}' THEN CAST(ISNULL(T3.U_IntervaloCitas, 15) AS int) ELSE 0 END),0) AS 'Lunes', ISNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN T2.U_FechaCita = '{1}' THEN CAST(ISNULL(T3.U_IntervaloCitas, 15) AS int) ELSE 0 END),0) AS 'Martes', ISNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN T2.U_FechaCita = '{2}' THEN CAST(ISNULL(T3.U_IntervaloCitas, 15) AS int) ELSE 0 END),0) AS 'Miercoles', ISNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN T2.U_FechaCita = '{3}' THEN CAST(ISNULL(T3.U_IntervaloCitas, 15) AS int) ELSE 0 END),0) AS 'Jueves', ISNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN T2.U_FechaCita = '{4}' THEN CAST(ISNULL(T3.U_IntervaloCitas, 15) AS int) ELSE 0 END),0) AS 'Viernes', ISNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN T2.U_FechaCita = '{5}' THEN CAST(ISNULL(T3.U_IntervaloCitas, 15) AS int) ELSE 0 END),0) AS 'Sabado', ISNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN T2.U_FechaCita = '{6}' THEN CAST(ISNULL(T3.U_IntervaloCitas, 15) AS int) ELSE 0 END),0) AS 'Domingo', ISNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN T2.U_FechaCita = '{8}' THEN CAST(ISNULL(T3.U_IntervaloCitas, 15) AS int) ELSE 0 END),0) AS 'LunesS2', ISNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN T2.U_FechaCita = '{9}' THEN CAST(ISNULL(T3.U_IntervaloCitas, 15) AS int) ELSE 0 END),0) AS 'MartesS2', ISNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN T2.U_FechaCita = '{10}' THEN CAST(ISNULL(T3.U_IntervaloCitas, 15) AS int) ELSE 0 END),0) AS 'MiercolesS2', ISNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN T2.U_FechaCita = '{11}' THEN CAST(ISNULL(T3.U_IntervaloCitas, 15) AS int) ELSE 0 END),0) AS 'JuevesS2', ISNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN T2.U_FechaCita = '{12}' THEN CAST(ISNULL(T3.U_IntervaloCitas, 15) AS int) ELSE 0 END),0) AS 'ViernesS2', ISNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN T2.U_FechaCita = '{13}' THEN CAST(ISNULL(T3.U_IntervaloCitas, 15) AS int) ELSE 0 END),0) AS 'SabadoS2', ISNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN T2.U_FechaCita = '{14}' THEN CAST(ISNULL(T3.U_IntervaloCitas, 15) AS int) ELSE 0 END),0) AS 'DomingoS2'
FROM "OHEM" T0 LEFT JOIN "OHPS" T1 ON T0.position = T1.posID INNER JOIN "@SCGD_CITA" T2 ON T0.empID = T2.U_Cod_Asesor INNER JOIN "@SCGD_AGENDA" T3 ON T2.U_Cod_Agenda = T3.DocNum WHERE T0."U_SCGD_TipoEmp" = 'A' AND T0."branch" = '{7}' AND T2."U_FechaCita" Between '{0}' AND '{14}' AND T2."U_Estado" <> '3' AND T2."U_Cod_Sucursal" = '{7}' Group By T1.name, T0.lastName, T0.firstName
UNION ALL
--Ocupación semanal de los técnicos sin orden de trabajo SELECT T1.name, (T0."lastName" + ' ' + T0."firstName") AS 'Empleado', ISNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN T2.U_FechaCita = '{0}' THEN ISNULL(T4.U_SCGD_DurSt, 0) ELSE 0 END),0) AS 'Lunes', ISNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN T2.U_FechaCita = '{1}' THEN ISNULL(T4.U_SCGD_DurSt, 0) ELSE 0 END),0) AS 'Martes', ISNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN T2.U_FechaCita = '{2}' THEN ISNULL(T4.U_SCGD_DurSt, 0) ELSE 0 END),0) AS 'Miercoles', ISNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN T2.U_FechaCita = '{3}' THEN ISNULL(T4.U_SCGD_DurSt, 0) ELSE 0 END),0) AS 'Jueves', ISNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN T2.U_FechaCita = '{4}' THEN ISNULL(T4.U_SCGD_DurSt, 0) ELSE 0 END),0) AS 'Viernes', ISNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN T2.U_FechaCita = '{5}' THEN ISNULL(T4.U_SCGD_DurSt, 0) ELSE 0 END),0) AS 'Sabado', ISNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN T2.U_FechaCita = '{6}' THEN ISNULL(T4.U_SCGD_DurSt, 0) ELSE 0 END),0) AS 'Domingo', ISNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN T2.U_FechaCita = '{8}' THEN ISNULL(T4.U_SCGD_DurSt, 0) ELSE 0 END),0) AS 'LunesS2', ISNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN T2.U_FechaCita = '{9}' THEN ISNULL(T4.U_SCGD_DurSt, 0) ELSE 0 END),0) AS 'MartesS2', ISNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN T2.U_FechaCita = '{10}' THEN ISNULL(T4.U_SCGD_DurSt, 0) ELSE 0 END),0) AS 'MiercolesS2', ISNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN T2.U_FechaCita = '{11}' THEN ISNULL(T4.U_SCGD_DurSt, 0) ELSE 0 END),0) AS 'JuevesS2', ISNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN T2.U_FechaCita = '{12}' THEN ISNULL(T4.U_SCGD_DurSt, 0) ELSE 0 END),0) AS 'ViernesS2', ISNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN T2.U_FechaCita = '{13}' THEN ISNULL(T4.U_SCGD_DurSt, 0) ELSE 0 END),0) AS 'SabadoS2', ISNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN T2.U_FechaCita = '{14}' THEN ISNULL(T4.U_SCGD_DurSt, 0) ELSE 0 END),0) AS 'DomingoS2'
FROM "OHEM" T0 LEFT JOIN "OHPS" T1 ON T0.position = T1.posID INNER JOIN "@SCGD_CITA" T2 ON T0.empID = T2.U_Cod_Tecnico INNER JOIN "OQUT" T3 ON T2."U_Num_Cot" = T3."DocEntry" INNER JOIN "QUT1" T4 ON T4.DocEntry = T3.DocEntry WHERE T0."U_SCGD_TipoEmp" = 'T' AND T0."branch" = '{7}' AND T2."U_FechaCita" Between '{0}' AND '{14}' AND T2."U_Estado" <> '3' AND T2."U_Cod_Sucursal" = '{7}' AND T3.U_SCGD_Numero_OT IS NULL Group By T1.name, T0.lastName, T0.firstName
UNION ALL
--Ocupación semanal con actividades asignadas y orden de trabajo SELECT T1.name, (T0."lastName" + ' ' + T0."firstName") AS 'Empleado', ISNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN T2.U_FechPro = '{0}' THEN ISNULL(T4.U_SCGD_DurSt, 0) ELSE 0 END),0) AS 'Lunes', ISNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN T2.U_FechPro = '{1}' THEN ISNULL(T4.U_SCGD_DurSt, 0) ELSE 0 END),0) AS 'Martes', ISNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN T2.U_FechPro = '{2}' THEN ISNULL(T4.U_SCGD_DurSt, 0) ELSE 0 END),0) AS 'Miercoles', ISNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN T2.U_FechPro = '{3}' THEN ISNULL(T4.U_SCGD_DurSt, 0) ELSE 0 END),0) AS 'Jueves', ISNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN T2.U_FechPro = '{4}' THEN ISNULL(T4.U_SCGD_DurSt, 0) ELSE 0 END),0) AS 'Viernes', ISNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN T2.U_FechPro = '{5}' THEN ISNULL(T4.U_SCGD_DurSt, 0) ELSE 0 END),0) AS 'Sabado', ISNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN T2.U_FechPro = '{6}' THEN ISNULL(T4.U_SCGD_DurSt, 0) ELSE 0 END),0) AS 'Domingo', ISNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN T2.U_FechPro = '{8}' THEN ISNULL(T4.U_SCGD_DurSt, 0) ELSE 0 END),0) AS 'LunesS2', ISNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN T2.U_FechPro = '{9}' THEN ISNULL(T4.U_SCGD_DurSt, 0) ELSE 0 END),0) AS 'MartesS2', ISNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN T2.U_FechPro = '{10}' THEN ISNULL(T4.U_SCGD_DurSt, 0) ELSE 0 END),0) AS 'MiercolesS2', ISNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN T2.U_FechPro = '{11}' THEN ISNULL(T4.U_SCGD_DurSt, 0) ELSE 0 END),0) AS 'JuevesS2', ISNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN T2.U_FechPro = '{12}' THEN ISNULL(T4.U_SCGD_DurSt, 0) ELSE 0 END),0) AS 'ViernesS2', ISNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN T2.U_FechPro = '{13}' THEN ISNULL(T4.U_SCGD_DurSt, 0) ELSE 0 END),0) AS 'SabadoS2', ISNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN T2.U_FechPro = '{14}' THEN ISNULL(T4.U_SCGD_DurSt, 0) ELSE 0 END),0) AS 'DomingoS2'
FROM "OHEM" T0 LEFT JOIN "OHPS" T1 ON T0.position = T1.posID INNER JOIN "@SCGD_CTRLCOL" T2 ON T2.U_Colab = T0.empID INNER JOIN OQUT T3 ON T2.Code = T3.U_SCGD_Numero_OT INNER JOIN QUT1 T4 ON T3.DocEntry = T4.DocEntry WHERE T0."branch" = '{7}' AND T3.U_SCGD_idSucursal = '{7}' --T0."U_SCGD_TipoEmp" = 'T' AND AND T2.U_FechPro Between '{0}' AND '{14}' AND T2.U_IdAct = T4.U_SCGD_ID AND T2.LineId = (SELECT TOP 1 S0.LineId FROM "@SCGD_CTRLCOL" S0 WHERE S0.Code = T3.U_SCGD_Numero_OT AND S0.U_IdAct = T2.U_IdAct AND S0.U_Colab = T0.empID) AND T3.U_SCGD_Numero_OT IS NOT NULL
Group By T1.name, T0.lastName, T0.firstName
UNION ALL
--Bloqueos de los técnicos por semanas SELECT T1.name, (T0."lastName" + ' ' + T0."firstName") AS 'Empleado', (SELECT -1 * ISNULL(SUM((S1.U_HoraF - S1.U_HorI) / 100),0) FROM "@SCGD_BLOCMEC" S1 WHERE S1.U_IdSucu = '{7}' AND S1.U_FechI = '{0}' AND S1.U_IdMec = T0.empID) AS 'Lunes', (SELECT -1 * ISNULL(SUM((S1.U_HoraF - S1.U_HorI) / 100),0) FROM "@SCGD_BLOCMEC" S1 WHERE S1.U_IdSucu = '{7}' AND S1.U_FechI = '{1}' AND S1.U_IdMec = T0.empID) AS 'Martes', (SELECT -1 * ISNULL(SUM((S1.U_HoraF - S1.U_HorI) / 100),0) FROM "@SCGD_BLOCMEC" S1 WHERE S1.U_IdSucu = '{7}' AND S1.U_FechI = '{2}' AND S1.U_IdMec = T0.empID) AS 'Miercoles', (SELECT -1 * ISNULL(SUM((S1.U_HoraF - S1.U_HorI) / 100),0) FROM "@SCGD_BLOCMEC" S1 WHERE S1.U_IdSucu = '{7}' AND S1.U_FechI = '{3}' AND S1.U_IdMec = T0.empID) AS 'Jueves', (SELECT -1 * ISNULL(SUM((S1.U_HoraF - S1.U_HorI) / 100),0) FROM "@SCGD_BLOCMEC" S1 WHERE S1.U_IdSucu = '{7}' AND S1.U_FechI = '{4}' AND S1.U_IdMec = T0.empID) AS 'Viernes', (SELECT -1 * ISNULL(SUM((S1.U_HoraF - S1.U_HorI) / 100),0) FROM "@SCGD_BLOCMEC" S1 WHERE S1.U_IdSucu = '{7}' AND S1.U_FechI = '{5}' AND S1.U_IdMec = T0.empID) AS 'Sabado', (SELECT -1 * ISNULL(SUM((S1.U_HoraF - S1.U_HorI) / 100),0) FROM "@SCGD_BLOCMEC" S1 WHERE S1.U_IdSucu = '{7}' AND S1.U_FechI = '{6}' AND S1.U_IdMec = T0.empID) AS 'Domingo',
(SELECT -1 * ISNULL(SUM((S1.U_HoraF - S1.U_HorI) / 100),0) FROM "@SCGD_BLOCMEC" S1 WHERE S1.U_IdSucu = '{7}' AND S1.U_FechI = '{8}' AND S1.U_IdMec = T0.empID) AS 'LunesS2', (SELECT -1 * ISNULL(SUM((S1.U_HoraF - S1.U_HorI) / 100),0) FROM "@SCGD_BLOCMEC" S1 WHERE S1.U_IdSucu = '{7}' AND S1.U_FechI = '{9}' AND S1.U_IdMec = T0.empID) AS 'MartesS2', (SELECT -1 * ISNULL(SUM((S1.U_HoraF - S1.U_HorI) / 100),0) FROM "@SCGD_BLOCMEC" S1 WHERE S1.U_IdSucu = '{7}' AND S1.U_FechI = '{10}' AND S1.U_IdMec = T0.empID) AS 'MiercolesS2', (SELECT -1 * ISNULL(SUM((S1.U_HoraF - S1.U_HorI) / 100),0) FROM "@SCGD_BLOCMEC" S1 WHERE S1.U_IdSucu = '{7}' AND S1.U_FechI = '{11}' AND S1.U_IdMec = T0.empID) AS 'JuevesS2', (SELECT -1 * ISNULL(SUM((S1.U_HoraF - S1.U_HorI) / 100),0) FROM "@SCGD_BLOCMEC" S1 WHERE S1.U_IdSucu = '{7}' AND S1.U_FechI = '{12}' AND S1.U_IdMec = T0.empID) AS 'ViernesS2', (SELECT -1 * ISNULL(SUM((S1.U_HoraF - S1.U_HorI) / 100),0) FROM "@SCGD_BLOCMEC" S1 WHERE S1.U_IdSucu = '{7}' AND S1.U_FechI = '{13}' AND S1.U_IdMec = T0.empID) AS 'SabadoS2', (SELECT -1 * ISNULL(SUM((S1.U_HoraF - S1.U_HorI) / 100),0) FROM "@SCGD_BLOCMEC" S1 WHERE S1.U_IdSucu = '{7}' AND S1.U_FechI = '{14}' AND S1.U_IdMec = T0.empID) AS 'DomingoS2'
FROM "OHEM" T0 LEFT JOIN "OHPS" T1 ON T0.position = T1.posID WHERE T0."U_SCGD_TipoEmp" = 'T' AND T0."branch" = '{7}'
UNION ALL
SELECT T1.name, (T0."lastName" + ' ' + T0."firstName") AS 'Empleado', 0 AS 'Lunes',0 AS 'Martes',0 AS 'Miercoles',0 AS 'Jueves',0 AS 'Viernes',0 AS 'Sabado',0 AS 'Domingo', 0 AS 'LunesS2',0 AS 'MartesS2',0 AS 'MiercolesS2',0 AS 'JuevesS2',0 AS 'ViernesS2',0 AS 'SabadoS2',0 AS 'DomingoS2' FROM "OHEM" T0 LEFT JOIN "OHPS" T1 ON T0.position = T1.posID WHERE T0.branch = '{7}' AND T0.U_SCGD_TipoEmp IS NOT NULL
) X1 Group By X1.Empleado, X1.name Order By X1.Empleado

data.name: String1HANA_QueryCosteosSalMer
data.value: SELECT Count(1) FROM "OIGE" INNER JOIN "IGE1" ON "IGE1"."DocEntry" = "OIGE"."DocEntry" INNER JOIN "OJDT" ON "OIGE"."TransId" = "OJDT"."TransId" WHERE ( "OIGE"."U_SCGD_Procesad" = 1 ) AND ( "OIGE"."U_SCGD_Cod_Unidad" = '{0}' ) AND ( "OIGE"."U_SCGD_Num_Vehiculo" IS NOT NULL ) AND ( "OJDT"."RefDate" <= '{1}' ) AND ( "OJDT"."TransId" NOT IN (SELECT "L"."U_NoAsient" FROM "@SCGD_GRLINES" "L" INNER JOIN "@SCGD_GOODRECEIVE" GR ON "GR"."DocEntry" = "L"."DocEntry" AND "GR"."U_Unidad" = '{0}' AND "L"."U_NoAsient" IS NOT NULL) )
